buy(uint256).notice: Purchase a dapp based on the dappId.

getCeramicURI(uint256).notice: Get information of a Dapp based on the dappId. (Ceramic URI)

getCreator(uint256).notice: Get information of a Dapp based on the dappId.

getDappCount().notice: Get total amount of Dapps Registered.

getDappInfo(uint256).notice: Get information of a Dapp based on the dappId.

getPoPURI(uint256).notice: Get metadata for the PoP NFT based on the dappId. (IPFS URI)

getPrice(uint256).notice: Get information of a Dapp based on the dappId.

userdoc.notice: DappStopRegistry allows game developers to register their games on dAppStop.When a creator registers their game, a DappStopPop NFT collection is created for them.
